## GraphBoot R Scripts

Creates degree distributions of the real world networks that are used in our experiments:

```{r}
require(plyr)
require(ggplot2)


rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))

vis<-function(inputFolder,dataset){
  
  dataFrame <-(read.csv(paste(inputFolder,dataset,"Dist.txt",sep=""),sep="\t",header=F))
  dataFrame<-arrange(dataFrame,V1)

  dataFrame$V3<-round(cumsum(dataFrame$V3),2)
  dataFrame$dataset<-dataset 
  return(dataFrame)
   
}
resultFolder <- "C:/Users/cxa123230/IdeaProjects/GraphBoot/results/dist/"
data<- vis(resultFolder,"Facebook")
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Enron"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Dblp"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Epinions"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Wiki"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Gowalla"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Kite"))

m12<- ggplot(data,aes(x=V1,y=V3, color=dataset,group=dataset))  
m12<- m12+geom_line(size=1)+geom_point(aes(shape=dataset), size=2) +scale_shape_manual(values=c(12,6,17,8,19,3,4)) 
m12<- m12+scale_x_log10(name="degree")+ theme(legend.position = c(0.8, 0.6),text = element_text(size=16)) 
m12<- m12+scale_y_continuous(name="fraction of nodes")
m12

resultFolder <- "C:/Users/cxa123230/IdeaProjects/GraphBoot/results/"
ggsave(filename=paste(resultFolder,"figs/dists.eps",sep=""),plot=m12,width=6,height=4,unit="in")
ggsave(filename=paste(resultFolder,"figs/dists.png",sep=""),plot=m12,width=6,height=4,unit="in")
 
```
